TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewCommandEventArgs extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 单击、或行字段中的按钮时，控件引发事件 。The control raises the event when a button within a , , or row field is clicked. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 当单击某些按钮时，该控件还会引发其他专用事件 (`CommandName` 属性设置为 "Delete"、"Insert"、"Page" 或 "Update" ) 。The control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Insert", "Page", or "Update"). 使用其中一个按钮时，应考虑使用控件提供的专用事件之一 (例如 或 ) 。When using one of these buttons, you should consider using one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as or ). 对象传递到事件处理程序。A object is passed to the event handler. 如果引发事件的按钮具有命令名称或命令参数值，则可以使用 对象来确定这些值。If the button that raised the event has a command name or command argument value, you can use the object to determine these values. 若要确定所单击按钮的命令名和命令参数，请 分别使用和 属性。To determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked, use the and properties, respectively. 还可以 通过使用属性访问引发事件的控件 。You can also access the control that raised the event by using the property. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 传递到事件的事件处理程序的对象 来确定用户单击的按钮的命令名。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to determine the command name of the button clicked by the user. 此示例使用单文件编码模型。This example uses the single-file coding model. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewcommandeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewcommandeventargsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示上一示例的代码隐藏编码模型版本。The following code example shows a code-behind coding model version of the previous example. 要使此示例正常运行，必须将下面的代码复制到关联的代码隐藏文件中。For this example to work, you must copy the code below into the associated code-behind file. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2/VB/DefaultVB.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例显示了上一示例的代码隐藏文件。The following code example shows the code-behind file for the previous example. [!code-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2/VB/DefaultVB.aspx.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||参数中包含的的属性的值 `originalArgs` 。The value of the property of the contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| || 参数中包含的对象的属性值 `originalArgs` 。The value of the property of the object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| ||参数中包含的对象 `commandSource` 。The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

span.span: Gets the source of the command.

value.span: 表示命令源的 类的实例。

span.span: An instance of the class that represents the source of the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性访问表示命令源的对象的属性。Use the property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command. 在某些情况下，这将是 控件本身，而在其他情况下，它将是被 单击的控件。In some cases, this will be the control itself, and in other cases it will be the control that was clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定哪个 控件引发了 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which of two controls raised the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCommandSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCommandSource/CS/detailsviewcommandeventargscommandsourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCommandSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCommandSource/VB/detailsviewcommandeventargscommandsourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示控件是否已处理事件的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.

value.span: 如果数据绑定事件代码跳过或已完成运行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished running; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事件处理程序中将此属性设置为， `true` 以指定 控件不应处理事件，因为您在代码中对其进行处理。Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
